actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the credit for foreign taxes shall not be allowed in the case of taxes paid to a foreign country with respect to income derived from the production of petroleum (or petroleum byproducts) or natural gas.

summary.text: Provides that the credit for foreign taxes shall not be allowed in the case of taxes paid to a foreign country with respect to income derived from the production of petroleum (or petroleum byproducts) or natural gas. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 901)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the credit for foreign taxes shall not be allowed in the case of taxes paid to a foreign country with respect to income derived from the production of petroleum (or petroleum byproducts) or natural gas.
